id.dldescription: Unique Id of the animal event

animalId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related animal

herdEventId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related herd event

animalEarNumber.dldescription: The ear number of the inseminated cow

calvingType.dldescription: The type of the calving (Normal Calving, Embryo Calving, Abortion (starts lactation), Early abortion (no lactation))

cowUsage.dldescription: Usage of the cow in this lactation (milking, suckler)

embryoTransfer.dldescription: If the calf is born embryo (Normal Calf, Emybro Calf)

parity.dldescription: The number of calving for the dam

parturitionEase.dldescription: The ease / difficulty of calving (Unkown, Without assistance, Was assisted, Strong pull assistance, Other assistance(caesarean,etc))
